text: Using the PageSpeed Insights provided by Google it is complaining that our 3rd party extentions are taking longer than desired to load. The highlighted rows being HubSpot - any ideas how I can reduce the times? HubSpot support said this question was out of the scope and expertise of their support and suggested I come here :thinking_face:

Hey <@UG9TDT52N>, we have some resources on our site regarding how we deal with site speeds:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/blog/site-speed-and-performance-what-we-do-and-what-you-can-do>
<https://www.HubSpot.com/products/marketing/content-management-system/site-speed>

I’d also recommend looking at this guide from <@U2PE56HCZ> of leadstreet: <https://www.leadstreet.be/en/blog/HubSpot-ultimate-page-speed-guide>
